title: Wangan Midnight: C1 Runner
original_name: 湾岸ミッドナイト C1 ランナー
sinopse: This new story features the adventures of the new main character, Shinji Ogishima (who debuted in the last chapters of the original story), and his friend, Nobu Setoguchi, both are part of "GT Cars" project which is in dispute and conflict, and must settle these problems by driving Mazda RX-7s around Shuto Expressway, and meeting with Tatsuya Shima.
